description.ko: ECHO-0는 복잡한 음파를 몰입형 디지털 풍경으로 변환하는 실험적인 시청각 시스템으로, 실시간 생성 예술을 통해 주파수와 형태 사이의 관계를 탐구합니다.
description.en: ECHO-0 is an experimental audiovisual system that translates complex sound waves into immersive digital landscapes, exploring the relationship between frequency and form through real-time generative art.

prompt: A futuristic sound visualization interface named ECHO-0, featuring glowing neon wave patterns, 3D parametric oscillations, deep blue and violet color palette, high-tech HUD elements, cinematic lighting, 8k resolution, abstract digital art style.
